title: Business Analyst
description:
Responsibilities


You need to be a big-picture problem solver and a strategic partner.
You also need to demonstrate analytical thinking through data-driven decisions and possess the technical know-how, fascination, and team spirit to make a huge impact.
The team member is expected to clean, analyze, and visualize student data.
Work with large, complex data sets to solve difficult, non-routine analysis problems.
Build data pipelines and dashboards to self-serve data needs.
Support senior leadership on business decisions through insights derived from data.


Requirements


1-2 Years of relevant experience in a business analytics role.
High proficiency in advanced Excel and SQL.
Proficiency in Python, PowerBI, VBA, and Tableau is preferred.
Good problem-solving and insight-generation skills.
Excellent communication skills with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Bachelor's degree is compulsory.


This job was posted by Tarandeep Kaur from Newton School.
